document_data.name: Army of Steel
document_data.mainbody: '''Army of Steel''' was the name for the [[duergar]] army from [[Dunspeirrin|Underspires]] that clashed with the [[Army of Gold]] in the caverns of [[Deep Shanatar]], the lost kingdom of the [[shield dwarves]].
document_data.History: In the caves of [[Taark Shanat]], the Army of Steel fought the [[gold dwarves]] from the [[Deep Realm]] around [[1369 DR]] in the [[War of Gold and Gloom]]. As of [[1372 DR]], the fighting between the Army of Steel and the Army of Gold still raged.
